markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cultural Adaptability](/Feats.aspx?ID=4465) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 60 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

During your adventures, you've honed your ability to adapt to the culture of the predominant ancestry around you. You gain the [Adopted Ancestry](/Feats.aspx?ID=751) general feat, and you also gain one 1st-level ancestry feat from the ancestry you chose for the Adopted Ancestry feat.
name: Cultural Adaptability
